aboutGame:
About game
RNG Incremental Beta 1.1
Developed by Humfrey
Inspired by Luck Idle level by 000000000000011 in Geometry Dash.
startHelpDescription: Choose the page to read it
help1:
Welcome to Luck Incremental!

It's luck based game where you roll once per 2 seconds and receive various rarities from Nothing to ... rn only Average.
Yes! This game will have hundreds of rarities soon :D.

Press the "Roll" button to roll some rarity, you'll get "Nothing" with 1/2 (50%) chance, "Absolute worst" with 1/4 (25%) and so on.
More info in "Roll system".

P.S. this game is raw now and won't have super ultra UI. It would be simple as Omega Layers for example. Of course I'll add some stuff later.
help2:
Roll System in details

This game has difficult roll system but I'll explain:
There is Random Number Generator which creates number in range of 1 to max (1024), but can be extended.
Chance system works with ranges. For example for Nothing you need to get number in range from 512 to 1024 (not max/2, but max-max/2, there would be difference as you get Roll Buster!)
Roll Buster reduces range of first 3 rarities to expand more for rest. After upgrade Nothing will have 1024-1024/2.1 (1024-487=537). So you'll get Nothing if you get Random Number in range of 537-1024. Which is smaller than 512-1024.
That would make ~300-1024 range for first three rarities while 0-300 for much better. For example there will be 1/14 chance for Disgusting instead of 1/16. And rest chances will be increased too!

So if you have 1 roll you can get rarity with their chance in brackets like Nothing(1/2) - means "once per 2 rolls" (NOT GUARANTEED) or 50%.
If you have 100 rolls you can get approx. 50 Nothings, 25 Absolute worst and so on. It's only approximately.
It means you can even get 10 Awful within 10 rolls if their chance 1/1024.

BUT! You can't get more rarities if their chance (1/x) where x larger than your max limit (1024). It means you won't get Terrible even after million rolls, because rng can't reach 1/2048 with 1024 limit.
help3:
Rarities - game currency

Right! Rarities are actually currencies and you can buy upgrades and unlockables with them.
You can get them with rolling and each rarity has own chance.
Basically it's twice as lower than previous rarity chance.
Soon in 1.1 you will be able to craft them into higher version as in 1.2 you will be able to downgrade them.
help4:
Upgrades to make progress faster

You can buy various upgrades like autoclicker, roll cooldown and so on with rarities
Each upgrade has V as max level but can be Mastered in later game (1.2).
All levels of upgrades has different price so they will require not just more rarities, but could require higher rarities too.
help7:
Frequently asked questions (FAQ)

Q: There is missing a lot things!
A: I know, it's raw version without QoL stuff. I'll add in future updates: offline progress, disable of autosave, mobile adaption, language, news ticker, improvement of UI, loading screen, prestige layer and so on.

Q: What's endgame?
A: There is no endgame, well you can have 3 goals: Buy Trophy I ➔ Get all upgrades maxed (and buy Trophy I) ➔ Get 1 Average. Well for next thing you need to buy Trophy.

Q: Game is so unbalanced.
A: Let me know in my discord server how I can improve it. Y'all testers so I'd appreciate any feedback! Also it might be your bad luck XD.

Q: Game looks so poor
A: Duh what you expect from raw 1.0? I'll add much more stuff in 1.1! I just want y'all to play this game early!
help5:
Crafter

Crafter is new tool which can be unlocked after buying Trophy II. It makes higher rarity from lower ones. Requires 3 lower rarities to get 1 higher. There is also opportunities to craft 10, 100, 1000 and 10000 in further game.
help6:
Decrafter

Decrafter is another tool which can be unlocked after buying Trophy III. It disassembles rarity into lower ones and requires 1 high rarity to make 2 lower. You also can decraft 10, 100, 1000 and 10000 in further game.
